about.title: About Me
about.description: I am an Information Technology professional with experience in project management, systems development, and technical support. I hold a degree in Information Systems and a technical degree in Electrotechnics. Throughout my career, I have worked as a registration agent, support analyst, IT project manager, and web developer. I have skills in digital certification, ERP/POS systems support, requirements gathering, process modeling, and team leadership.
